Hi Sarah, 

Sure, we have made the updates for you. 

Here's the link:
https://www.msaustralia.org.au/about-us/our-people/our-team/

How to do it:
1. I added another text field: surname
2. Add Tax Query specific to CEO role (make CEO show first in the list)
3. Set Order & Offset Order by to Meta Value: surname

Let us know if you need further assistance.

Hi @ricaV2 done team page update

Add Tax Query specific to CEO role (make CEO show first in the list)
Set Order & Offset Order by to Meta Value: surname

Hi Sarah, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://www.msaustralia.org.au/about-us/our-people/our-team/

How to do it:
1. Go to Edit Listing Grid
2. Find Post Query in left side bar
3. Click Order & Offset and set the following
- Order: ASC
- Order by: Name

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi @ricaV2 done team updates

✅ alphabetical order

How to do it:
1. Go to Edit Listing Grid
2. Find Post Query in left side bar

3. Click Order & Offset and set the following
    - Order: ASC
    - Order by: Name

https://www.msaustralia.org.au/about-us/our-people/our-team/

Time: +5mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Good morning


I would like to make some changes to this page - https://www.msaustralia.org.au/about-us/our-people/our-team/


Can you tell me how I do this? I have added Jeremy Henderson and Sarah Morrison as "People" but am unsure how to move into alphabetical order on this page? If you could let me know how to do this as we will have more amendments coming up, including adding five staff and removing Gabrielle Ferguson. I did try "Edit listing Grid" but was unable to move the "People" into alphabetical order.





Thank you for your help.


Regards




Sarah
